original_text: And let it be given into the hand of the workmen who have the oversight of the house of the Lord, and let them give it to the workmen who are at the house of the Lord, repairing the house
korean_text: 여호와의 성전을 맡은 감독자의 손에 넘겨 그들이 여호와의 성전에 있는 작업자에게 주어 성전에 부숴진 것을 수리하게 하되

sentences.original_text: And let it be given into the hand of the workmen
who have the oversight of the house of the Lord
and let them give it to the workmen
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 그것을 일꾼들에게 주게 하라

sentences.original_text: who are at the house of the Lord
